metadata.title: CVE-2015-3908 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Ansible before 1.9.2 does not verify that the server hostname matches adomain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName field ofthe X.509 certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoofSSL servers via an arbitrary valid certificate.

criterions.comment: ansible package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
